subsc: General finance sector,General industry and trade sector,Other domestic and international trade,Banking,Central government administration

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Rehabilitation
            Loan Project are to: (i) support the government economic
            reform program; (ii) support access of importers to foreign
            exchange through a foreign exchange component; (iii) finance
            critically needed imported inputs and essential medicines,
            to ease the acute shortage of foreign exchange; and (iv)
            promote and provide a framework for financial assistance
            from other donor agencies.
